clean_data: Division Cybersecurity Analyst Division Cybersecurity Analyst Division Cybersecurity Analyst Jacksonville FL Cybersecurity Specialist and Military Veteran with a Secret Security Clearance and 13 years of proven experience in the United States Navy Accomplished measurable results while leading teams of 30 in a dynamic fastpaced environment Possess a comprehensive background in DatabaseSystems Administration and Cybersecurity derived from conducting domestic and global operations Managed risk upon multiple lines to protect assets property and equipment valued at over 20M while exceeding the expectations of senior leadership Possess extensive knowledge in Program Management Project Management and Information Assurance Career supported by dual Masters degrees in Cybersecurity and Business Management Work Experience Division Cybersecurity Analyst US Navy Norfolk VA March 2015 to May 2019 Orchestrated the enforcement of Identity and Access Management on information systems and networks assigned Trained personnel on network operating procedures for Information Assurance consistent with organizational policies to include user access data integrity applicationsystem software protection and classified unclassified data safeguard Developed and implemented information systems security procedures in compliance with government regulations and policies in support of system certification Performed maintenance troubleshooting and documentation on computer security measures including monitoring alerts conducting investigations and remediation of violations to organizational policies Performed limited risk vulnerability assessments of internal controls on equipment and personnel Assembled and analyzed information identifying areas for improvement and prepared reports in accordance with agency guidelines addressing Compliance Reviews and Audits DatabaseSystems Administrator US Navy September 2006 to March 2015 Administered Identity Role Based Provisioning of user accounts to include privileged access to classified information Performed maintenance and troubleshooting on local and remote Windows Unix and Database platforms providing accountability serviceability and maintenance information on US Government aircraft and equipment valued at more than 20M with an operational readiness rating of 98 Developed procedures on data governance and accountability for 3 geographically isolated units enforcing cybersecurity policies Determined staffing needs and managed training programs to include selection and qualification of over 115 team members across multiple units serving as the subject matter expert Collaborated in designing and documenting standards and procedures for user and access control administration while balancing security standards and accessibility requirements Counseled in the development and implementation of information systems security procedures in accordance with government regulations and policies Ensured configuration management of manned unmanned aircraft and addressed configuration problems affecting the confidentiality integrity and availability of critical data resulting in zero loss on all units Education Master of Science MS in Cybersecurity Excelsior College 2017 to 2018 Master of Science MS in Administration and Management Excelsior College 2016 to 2017 Bachelors degree in Business Administration and Management Excelsior College 2013 to 2016 Associate of Science in AS Business Administration and Management General Excelsior College Skills SYSTEM ADMINISTRATION
